job.command: cd ${SUBMITTINGDIRECTORY} # setup 64b # setup gcc # setenv NODEBUG yes setenv STARFPE NO # starver .DEV2 foreach input (`cat $FILELIST`) # set filel = `basename ${input}` set filel = `basename ${input} .event.root` set output = ${filel}.root set logFile = ${filel}B.log if (! -r ${logFile} ) then root.exe -q -b 'TpcAligner.C(9999999,"'${input}'","P2015a,CorrX,Alignment","'${output}'")' >& ${logFile} endif end
